## Goals

I have updated the back end response for favoriteLocation api. before this fetch api dont have pagination, not it have pagination. I want you to update the fetch parameter and how to handle pagination, but pagination in here is not using button pagination but a button with label `Load More` to add new item. you can see reference how to handle that.

## Scope

- app/pages/tempat-favorite/index
